topics.body:
You know. I get the feeling Disney is a tad bit of a sore loser. In Marvel comics, the Fantastic four comic has been canceled and the x memn and mutant kind have been pushed off into space. Reason: earth has been covered by something called terrigen mist: its a mist used by some guys called the Inhumans and is deadly to mutants.

Oh it also just HAPPENS to be mutagenic to humans, turns them into Inhumans. Mmmmm hmmm.

By the way did I mention Fantastic Four and X men's films rights are owned by 20th century fox. And merchandize for xmen and fantastic four just happened to stop being made. Hmmmm.

http://www.bleedingcool.com/2015/05/07/so-what-happens-to-the-x-men-after-secret-wars-spoilers/


On a cooler note, Doctor Doom is fricken. GOD. in the comics now apparently. Oh and he has an army of Thors. That is cool.

topics.body:
"@Princess♠Molestia":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5577cb226368724709001f48#post_5577cb226368724709001f48
Call me crazy, but I think Disney is trying to intentionally run the current hype around comic book heroes into the ground by making as many superhero films as humanly possible.

When it comes to popularity hype there's a thing called genre fatigue.  Essentially if you make too many movies of the same genre in a short time frame the general populace gets tired of it.  It's just my personal opinion but I think Disney is essentially trying to squeeze out every last drop of hype AND money as they possibly can before people wind up getting sick of superheroes.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5577cb716368726ef000114f#post_5577cb716368726ef000114f
Honestly. The universe after Secret wars  and Secret Wars itself sounds cool.

Dr doom has actually won, he's God. Sure hell be beaten

The tie ins sound cool: planet hulk, a captain America and devil dinosaur vs a bunch of hulks. A bunch of ghost riders racing for their souls. Cowboy marvel. Spider man vows renewed. an ultron army vs a marvel zombies universe.

Also There's gonna be three spider mans in the new universe; spiderman, spider Gwen, miles morales. And Kamala khan is still around. Yay!

The fact that Disney seems to be a sore loser is a sour note though.

topics.body:
"@Princess♠Molestia":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5577cdac63687273b50007a5#post_5577cdac63687273b50007a5
[bq="Princess♠Molestia"]"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5577cc7a6368720e6600005e#post_5577cc7a6368720e6600005e
Its not really Disney so much as them, DC, and...everyone else.

I love superheros, but I'm staring to think " guys! Calm down! You don't need so many superhero shows! Wait. DC is amkimg a movie universe too? Your making a bubble guys!"[/bq]
"@Princess♠Molestia":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5577cdac63687273b50007a5#post_5577cdac63687273b50007a5
[bq="Princess♠Molestia"]"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5577cc7a6368720e6600005e#post_5577cc7a6368720e6600005e
*Your making a bubble guys!"*[/bq]
THAT'S THE FUCKING POINT OF MASS MEDIA!

Whenever something is popular vomit out as much mass media for the genre as you possibly can before the public gets tired of it then move onto the next thing.  That's why anime movies are in the works currently cause when the superhero bubble pops they take the next big thing and vomit out countless movies and then when that bubble pops move onto the next thing.
